titles.title: A bill to clarify that graduate programs in clinical psychology are health professions schools for purposes of title VII of the Public Health Service Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that graduate programs in clinical psychology are health professions schools for the purposes of title VII (Health Research and Teaching Facilities).
